properties.description: Detects when a job used as a secondary destination is removed.
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 23420
| extend JobName =  extract("JobName=\"(?<JobName>[^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Job Name"] = JobName,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: Job No Longer Used as Second Destination
